featured.text: Abraham Lincoln did the same, but then the inaugural crowds became far too large for the White House to accommodate comfortably, and this also created a security issue.
Many people try to save a lot of money before _____, since having enough money would give them a sense of security for their future.
When the male dies, the group needs a new “security guard.”
For this last case, Jack had to go in person to Thatcher's office ‘for security reasons’!

other.text: The two security guards will be from all their duties until further investigation is completed.
He then _____ himself as a security guard and walked out the front gate.
The architect did it for security reasons (C)

definition.zh_def: 安全性；保護措施或狀態，以防止危險或損失。
definition.en_def: The state of being free from danger or threat; measures taken to ensure safety.
definition.example: The company invested in new security systems to protect its data.
